name: Trash Ocean
description:
A free to play game where you play as a fish to dodge all the trash and garbage floating around the ocean. This game aims to spread awareness that trash in the ocean can be dangerous to marine life. Your main objective is to survive for as long as possible by evading all the floating trash. Beat your high score or beat your friends' high score.

Don't forget that we must do our part to not throw garbage in our oceans as many marine creatures die to the trash that are now floating around in the ocean. Let us Protect our Oceans.

Controls:

- Mouse movement: Moving the fish around

- Esc: Pause and Menu

Downloadable Versions (Windows): https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1fcVlTnQaMHh7pvtkMfP_8patTeJpd80o?usp=sharing
